table.name: vtiger_businessprocess
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessprocess` ( `bpid` int(11) NOT NULL, `bpname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `bpno` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bpid`), KEY `bpname` (`bpname`), KEY `bpno` (`bpno`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_businessprocesscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessprocesscf` ( `bpid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cf_973` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `cf_974` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`bpid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
